publication.title: An efficient key scheme for layered access control of MPEG4 FGS video
publication.jconf: International Conference on Multimedia Computing and Systems/International Conference on Multimedia and Expo
publication.keyword: Discrete Logarithm;Hash Function;Key Agreement;Satisfiability;Access Control;diffie hellman;
publication.abstract: The recently proposed Scalable Multi-Layer FGS Encryption (SMLFE) (4)(5) encrypts an MPEG-4 FGS stream into multiply PSNR and bitrate quality layers for layered access control. Both layer types are supported simultaneously. A simple key scheme was used in SMLFE. In this paper, we propose a novel key scheme for SMLFE that reduces the number of keys maintained and managed by

publication.title: A framework of scalable layered access control for multimedia
publication.jconf: IEEE International Symposium on Circuits and Systems

publication.title: Signed MSB-Set Comb Method for Elliptic Curve Point Multiplication
Compoweb: a component-oriented web architecture
publication.authors: rui guo,bin b. zhu,aimin pan,bosheng zhou
publication.abstract: In this paper, client-site Web mashups are studied from component-oriented perspective, and CompoWeb, a component- oriented Web architecture, is proposed. In CompoWeb, a Web application is decomposed into Web components called gadgets. A gadget is an abstraction of functional or logical Web component. It is isolated from other gadgets for security and reliability. Contract-based channels are the only way to
